titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to deposit $1,400,000 into the Judgment Fund of the Department of Justice to cover those costs of the project for flood control, Lost Creek, Columbus, Nebraska, which are in excess of the $4,000,000 limit on projects carried out under section 205 of the Flood Control Act of 1948.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 2/28/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to deposit $1.4 million into the Judgment Fund of the Department of Justice to cover excess costs of the Lost Creek flood control project, Columbus, Nebraska, as authorized under the Flood Control Act of 1948. Authorizes appropriations in the same amount for FY 1995.
